EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 8_Dev ops cloud for large enterprise
EmailTemplate.subject: Get an inside look at successful DevOps cloud implementations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use cases provide lessons learned and point to savings Hello Sir/Madam,
Get the DevOps cloud you really need by leveraging what others have learned along the way.
Read the use case “DevOps cloud for large enterprises <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_DevOps.Cloud.LargeEnterprise.LP.html?did=d000000000ay&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 8a-devopscloudforLEusecase&utm_term=general]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations. The use case reveals how you can:
- Upgrade your large enterprise environment into a leading-edge DevOps cloud - Provide a rich and globally consistent user experience - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
